embed.description: The Icebreaker Cabin is a building in Snowdwell inhabited by Charles. It is the building in the middle, above the Tribe hall. The player is able to examine unlocked events that can happen during runs and find the challenge to unlock the next one.

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value:
Shade Sculptor - Gain 50 Bling fro a Single battle
Charm Merchant - Kill 15 Enemies with Shroom
Gnome Traveller - Feed the Muncher 5 Times

embed.title: Icebreaker Cabin
